thread.title: WATCH: Oscar Shares Video Of Him Tormenting Linesman In China
thread.title_full: WATCH: Oscar Shares Video Of Him Tormenting Linesman In China

title: WATCH: Oscar Shares Video Of Him Tormenting Linesman In China
text:
WATCH: Oscar Shares Video Of Him Tormenting Linesman In China Wed Feb 08 2017 12:40:19   12:40:19 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Former Chelsea midfielder Oscar scored on his full debut for Chinese side Shanghai SIPG yesterday. 
However, it seems it wasn't just the opposition defenders who struggled to keep tabs on the Brazilian international, as Oscar gave the linesman all sorts of issues. 
The 25-year-old left the Premier League for a reported Â£60 million in January, being the latest big-name to swap life in Europe for a huge salary in the Chinese Super League. 
And Oscar, still celebrating his first goal for Shanghai, decided to upload this video to his official Twitter account, showing the official being bamboozled by his skill and trickery: - Oscar (@oscar8) February 8, 2017 
Oscar's debut strike helped Shanghai seal a resounding 3-0 victory over Thai club Sukhothai, in the 2017 AFC Champions League qualifying play-off. 
Meanwhile rumour has it that the linesman in Oscar's video is currently recuperating in hospital following the double hip operation he needed after being turned inside out by the ex- Internacional player. 
This story was first featured on talkingbaws.com - simple, shareable sport. Like them on Facebook and follow them on Twitter. Featured Image Credit: Oscar/Twitter
